0.text: Innate: Jarvan IV's basic attacks deal 8% of the target's current health as additional physical damage, with a minimum threshold of 20 and capped at 400 against all targets.

1.text: This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.

0.text: Active: Jarvan IV extends his lance in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and inflicting them with  armor reduction for 3 seconds.

1.text: If the lance connects with a deployed  Demacian Standard, Jarvan IV  dashes to its location,  knocking up nearby enemies around him along his path for 0.75 seconds.

2.text: Jarvan IV can cast any of his abilities during the dash.

0.text: Active: Jarvan IV  slows all nearby enemies for 2 seconds.

1.text: Jarvan IV also  shields himself for 5 seconds, increased by 1.3% of his maximum health for each enemy  champion hit by Golden Aegis.

0.text: Passive: Jarvan IV gains  bonus attack speed.

1.text: Active: Jarvan IV throws a Demacian flag to the target location, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area.

2.text: The flag then remains for 8 seconds, granting  sight of its surroundings and providing an aura that grants bonus attack speed equal to Demacian Standard's passive to Jarvan IV and all nearby allied champions.

3.text: Demacian Standard will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Jarvan IV  leaps with  displacement immunity to the target enemy champion's location over 0.35 seconds and deals physical damage to all nearby enemies upon arrival.

1.text: Upon impact, he creates a circle of impassable terrain that initially pulls units inside it, though not rendering them  airborne. The terrain lasts for 3.5 seconds and grants  sight of the area. Cataclysm can be recast after 1 second.

2.text: Recast: Jarvan IV destroys the terrain created by Cataclysm.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

Keywords

  • totem
  • trinket

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+7% omnivamp against monsters

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sear: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.
Unique – Challenging Path: Using Smite 5 times consumes this item to upgrade your Smite into Challenging Smite, doubling its damage, and grants all of this item's effects permanently after a 2.5-second delay.
Unique – Huntsman: Killing large monsters grants 60 bonus experience. The first large monster killed grants an additional 150 bonus experience, for a total of 210. If you are at least 2 levels below the average level of the game, large monster kills grant 50 bonus experience per level below the average level of all players in the game. If your gold from minions is greater than 40% your gold from monsters, a lane minion will grant 13 less gold and 50% reduced experience. This penalty is removed at 20 minutes.
Unique – Recoup: Regenerate up to 8 − 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the jungle or river, based on missing mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SEAR: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • jungle

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).
passive.originText: UNIQUE: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.21 health every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, restoring a total of 125 health.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.21 health every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, restoring a total of 125 health.

Stats

+8% omnivamp

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Thirsting Slash: Deal 175% base AD physical damage to enemies in a 450 radius centered around you. Heal for 20% AD (+ 8% of your missing health) for each enemy champion hit (15 (reduced by ability haste) second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – THIRSTING SLASH: Deal 175% base AD physical damage to enemies in a  450 radius centered around you.  Heal for 20% AD (+ 8% of your missing health) for each enemy champion hit (15 (reduced by ability haste) second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 7 ability haste.
passive.originText: MYTHIC PASSIVE: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 7 ability haste.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+55 attack damage
+15 ability haste
+45 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Ignore Pain: Stores ( 30% / 10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.
Unique – Defy: If an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of you damaging them, removes Ignore Pain's remaining stored damage, and heals you for 120% bonus AD over 2 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IGNORE PAIN: Stores ( 30% /  10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+350 health
+60 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Thorns: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 20% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 25% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds. Immobilizing enemy champions also inflicts them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – THORNS: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 20% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 25%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.  Immobilizing enemy champions also inflicts them with 40%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Rebirth: Upon taking lethal damage, enter resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are invulnerable, untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – REBIRTH: Upon taking lethal damage, enter  resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are  invulnerable,  untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards  heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).

Stats

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Lifeline: If you would take magic damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a shield that absorbs ( 200 / 150) (+ ( 225% / 168.75%) bonus AD) magic damage for 5 seconds (75 second cooldown).
Unique: Triggering Lifeline also grants 10% omnivamp for 5 seconds. After 2 seconds into the duration, taking or dealing damage refreshes this effect to 3 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – LIFELINE: If you would take magic damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a  shield that absorbs ( 200 /  150) (+ ( 225% /  168.75%) bonus AD) magic damage for 5 seconds (75 second cooldown).

Jarvan IV also  shields himself for 5 seconds, increased by 1.3% of his maximum health for each enemy  champion hit by Golden Aegis.
Passive: Jarvan IV gains  bonus attack speed.
Active: Jarvan IV throws a Demacian flag to the target location, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area.
